tweets.text: One of the most thrilling parts of @TenantFed launch is the possibilities it unlocks for a new kind of power, new forms of solidarity. I’m especially hungry to explore the connections to organized labor. Locally, there’s plenty of richness already. More to come ‼️ https://t.co/nCD9DP3N3F
